front: This is a flashcard sample. Click on turn, to flip the card and see its back.
back: This is the back of the card. Continue to the next card.

front: The flashcards app operates like this (flip now).
back: You Write a theme to study (get to next card)

front: You write the question or assertion in the front and (flip now)
back: In the back you write the answer (get to next card).

front: You look at the front, think about the write answer (flip now)
back: And turn the card. If the answer was correct, you mark the correct button (next card).

front: If your answer was wrong, obviously, you indicate it as well (flip card)
back: The answer is mentally, so you are only accountable to yourself in your study. (next card)

front: At the end, you see a set of stats relative to your performance (flip)
back: You can add cards, edit cards, erase, download the whole stack (next card)

front: And, of course, you can add your stack with your questions and answers (flip)
back: The control is all yours and you can enhance your study, by improving your memorization (next card).

front: And that is all. Now, create your own stack of cards (flip)
back: Enjoy it and good luck in your studies.
